alert.note: Alert for Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Extreme Wind Warning issued September 28 at 10:46AM EDT until September 28 at 12:45PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Ruskin has issued a * Extreme Wind Warning for... Central Lee County in southwestern Florida... * Until 1245 PM EDT. * At 1045 AM EDT, National Weather Service Doppler radar indicated extreme winds, associated with a broad area of intense thunderstorms, located 7 miles south of St. James City, or 14 miles southwest of Cape Coral, moving north at 5 mph. THIS IS AN EXTREMELY DANGEROUS AND LIFE-THREATENING SITUATION! A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EDT for southwestern Florida.
info.instruction: The safest place to be during a major landfalling hurricane is in a reinforced interior room away from windows. Get under a table or other piece of sturdy furniture. Use mattresses, blankets or pillows to cover your head and body. Remain in place through the passage of these life-threatening conditions.
